item.title: Introducing Dec My Room
item.description: As you guys know, On Point makes it a point to support our community and give back both with time and charitable contributions. Throughout our history, weâ€™ve worked with a variety of local and national organizations to give back in different ways. We have a longstanding history with Habitat for Humanity, Houston Food Bank and Candlelighters and last year had the amazing opportunity to work with the Ronald McDonald House of Houston to design + build a custom playhouse for the residents of the home.
